: : Rodimus Prime : : 
Rodimus smiled at being called a father. 
Rodimus Prime: Thanks Yggdrasil. Of course if anything really serious comes up contact me. Rodimus out. 
Roddy closes the link, and waits for Nightlight and the baby to make it to the table. 
 "Nic <wingedwarrior41@...>" <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: Yggdrasil smiled wearily.

Yggdrasil: So the legendary Rodimus Prime is a father...
Congratulations, both of you! I'll monitor the battle east, but I'm
not sure what I can do about it. Until then, good rest.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> Rodimus Prime(via commlink): Yes we are fine. Nightlight went into
labor while we were on mission. Our daughter has been born... 
> That simple fact still shocked Rodimus in a good way. 
>  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
Yggdrasil: Are you and Nighlight all right, Rodimus? Blackfang told me
> something happened to her?
>
